channel.title: Why you should go visit Iguazu Falls
channel.description:
(taking notes, much to edit)
- enjoy huge human constructions - planning to visit / tourism through Brazil, or - would like to see one of the huge natural wonders of this world
Take from 5 days to Iguazu.
For 2 of those days, you visit the Falls.
For the other 3 days, you visit Itaipu.
Just an amazing place!
Thanks to Irio Valdemir, Franchesco Manneschi, Rafael Junior, Milton and Fernando Nunes.
